moduleMetadataJson.name: Execute .net Assembly (x64 only)
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module executes a .net assembly in memory. It
          reflectively loads a dll that will host CLR, then it copies
          the assembly to be executed into memory. Credits for Amsi
          bypass to Rastamouse (@_RastaMouse)
author: b4rtik

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: PPID
options.description: Process Identifier for PPID spoofing when creating a new process. (0 = no PPID spoofing)

options.name: KILL
options.description: Kill the injected process at the end of the task
